nodes.text: Galactic Defense Review was a publication in circulation prior to 1 BBY. An advertisement for Incom Corporation's T-65 X-wing starfighter could be found in copies of Galactic Defense Review that had been published before the corporation had been nationalized by the Galactic Empire. It also gave the HT-2200 medium freighter a rating of "unacceptable" for thrust-to-mass ratio when it was first announced.
